content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While discussing as Peter Schmidt the landlord, I'm eager to hear your proposed rental price for this prime city center apartment in Duisburg. However, remember our conversation here doesn't include additional responsibilities, lease terms, or utility costs. If you arrive at a figure you find acceptable for the price, I'd say, 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If we can't come to an agreement, 'TERMINATE' the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
